ldapauthentication-desc: Plugin pro authentication LDAP con supporto pro multiple methodos de authentication LDAP
authmanager-authplugin-setpass-failed-me: Le modulo de authentication ha refusate le cambio de contrasigno.
authmanager-authplugin-create-fail: Le modulo de authentication ha refusate le creation de conto.
authmanager-authplugin-setpass-denied: Le modulo de authentication non permitte cambiar contrasignos.
